alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 4:17PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tooele County through 445 PM MDT... At 416 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, or 19 miles west of Dugway English Village, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dugway English Village, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range and Skull Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
